summary_md:
# PTD Today Quarter-to-Date Intelligence Brief

## 1) Top Themes
- Political shifts and policy announcements in New York City
- Significant tragic incident: deadly fire and explosion at Swiss ski resort
- High-profile political/legal developments in the U.S.
- New Year celebrations in global regions
- Media coverage dominated by video content

## 2) Top Stories
- NYC Mayor Mamdani unveils housing agenda through executive orders signaling a new policy direction (Source: Reuters).  
- NYC Mayor Mamdani commits to imposing a democratic socialist agenda early in his tenure (Source: Reuters).  
- Deadly fire at a Swiss ski resort bar during New Year celebrations has resulted in dozens killed and over 100 injured (Source: CNN, Reuters).  
- Live coverage continues at the scene of the Swiss resort blast, underscoring the severity of the incident (Source: Reuters).  
- Dozens presumed dead from the New Year catastrophe at the Swiss ski resort, highlighting ongoing rescue and investigation efforts (Source: CNN).  
- Former President Trump expresses a dramatic personal sentiment in an interview with the Wall Street Journal (Source: CNN).  
- Deposition video of Jack Smith has been released, indicating an important legal proceeding or inquiry (Source: CNN).  
- The Middle East celebrated the arrival of 2026 with large-scale and spectacular festivities (Source: Reuters).

## 3) Sector Takeaways
- Grid / Renewables: Not enough information in the headline.  
- Data Centers & AI: Not enough information in the headline.

## 4) Notable Companies/Regions Mentioned
- New York City (NYC) – political developments under Mayor Mamdani  
- Swiss ski resort – site of deadly fire and blast  
- The Middle East – noted for New Year celebrations  
- Individuals: NYC Mayor Mamdani, former President Trump, Jack Smith
